anagatha parapura pilibanda sitha rata thula kerena sanwardhana wadapiliwela kisidu abhiyogayak hamuwe aapasu harawannata sudanam nomathi bawa janadhipathi mahinda rajapaksha mahatha awadharanaya karayi.rata wenuwen ape yuthukama ha wagakima harihati itu kirima wenuwen labena chodana sathutak bawa pawasu janadhipathiwaraya gal mul ella wanne pala athi rukata pamanak bawa pawasayi.janadhipathiwaraya mese prakasha kale jathika gowi sathiye samarambhaka awasthawata wariyapola rajaye gowipaledi pereda (6) ekwemini.jathika gowi sathiya wenuwen krushikarma amathyanshaya sanwidhana karana dawantha pradarshanaya narambaimata ek wu janadhipathiwaraya hondama gowinta thilana saha sahathika path pradanayata da ek wiya.gowi janathawa wenuwen kala sewaya agaya janadhipathithuma wetha upahara thilinayak pirinamuwe wayambaa palath hitapu krushikarma amathi di. bi. herath mahatha wisini.anagathaye rata ya yuththe kothanatada kiya handunagena ee wenuwen sanwardhana wadapiliwelak prathama warata kriyathmaka kale mahinda chinthana prathipaththiya mangin bawa janadhipathiwaraya pawasiya.kumbauru godakara ratin aahara genwima labadayaka yayi sitha katayuthu kala aandu eda pawathi bawa sihipath kala wi alewi mandalaya wasa dama wi gabada angalum kamhal damannata owun katayutha kala bawa prakasha kaleya.madamulana kiyana pitisara, dushkara gamin aa thaman gowi janathawa gana hondin danna nisa owunta upaharayak wanu pinisa krushikarmanathya nanga situwime wadapiliwela kriyathmaka kala bawath janadhipathiwaraya kiweya.jyeshta amathi es. bi. nawinna, krushikarma amathi mahinda yapa abewardhana, wayambaa palath hitapu krushikarma amathi di. bi. herath mahathwaru da mehidi adahas dak wuha.amathiwarun wana anura priyadarshana yapa, ti. bi. eekanayaka, salinda disanayaka, jonstan pranandu, niyojya amathiwarun wana indika bandaranayaka, jayarathna herath, wayambaa palath aandukara thissa aar.
